title: Executive Producer
content:
Build A Rocket Boy is developing EVERYWHERE, an experience with a breadth of unimaginable gameplay adventure. 
We are a mix of industry leading veterans whose credits include some of the bestselling and most loved games of all time. Weâ€™re a creative digital entertainment studio with an open and progressive methodology, dedicated to delivering games of the highest calibre possible. Would you like to help build an experience that will redefine how players connect with one another and with the digital world around them? If you are ready to help forge a new future for gamers Everywhere, read on. 
Our products are at the heart of our business and player experience. This critical role will build and grow the foundation for our ability to translate feature and business model needs to meet player satisfaction, retention, and acquisition goals. As the Executive Producer, you will work to form a powerful team and ensure the success of the studio by balancing value and capability to deliver an engaging player experience and meet our financial goals.
Our ideal candidate is an experienced Executive or Lead Producer who is comfortable managing the game's content releases, events, and updates to ensure that players are engaged and retained while achieving engagement and revenue goals. They have a passion for games and for their team creating growth and opportunities for their success while maintaining a balanced production capacity. 
Key Duties: 

Deliver a commercially viable product roadmap in partnership with the studio and product management. Includes, all developer resources, development planning, and games as a service
Participate in creation of franchise plans and product strategy for a key studioâ€™s IP
Partner and collaborate between publishing and development to drive accountability for all development goals
Use and analyze Live Ops, product, and market data to make roadmap and product decisions and adjustments
Own development processes, workflows, and maintaining visibility and predictability for the product
Development, manage, grow, and coach, the Production teams
Partner and empower development and publishing leadership to ensure product quality goals and KPIs are met
Build trust with partnerships, reports, and peers by using data driven approaches to problem solving while managing trade offs between cost, quality and time
Responsible for oversight, empowerment, and overall delivery for all internal discipline teams for highest quality AAA product
Bring clarity, focus, and energy studio wide through shared processes, communication, and reporting

Your Qualifications: 

Previous Lead or Executive Producer experience or equivalent with internal game developer
10+ yearsâ€™ experience in game development; full lifecycle experience developing and operating PC or console games
Experience in end-to-end product development, management and life cycle planning.
Practical experience in setting, guiding and evaluating production processes.
Track record of budget, project and people management. Track record of direct leadership & significant influence within a scaled organization.
Previous responsibility for projects with $100MM+ development budgets.
Wide and deep understanding of game industry, business models and gameplay nuances across both Live / Games as Service gameplay and RPG gameplay.
Wide and deep understanding of project management, esp. creative projects and software development.
Knowledge of project financing & project resourcing.
Effective communication and deep relationship-building with multi-faceted teams is required, including: developers, finance, product management, business development, marketing, Comms, QA, Exec and more.
Strong project and time management skills with a proven ability to organize teams set priorities, solve complex problems, drive innovative solutions, meet deadlines and resolve conflicts.
Ability to create and deliver effective presentations.
Excellent leadership, interpersonal, and organizational skills
